titleStmt.title: A dialogue between custom and veritie concerning the vse and abuse of dauncing and minstrelsie
titleStmt.author: Lovell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the long shop adioyning vnto Saint Mildreds Church in the Pultrie by Iohn Allde,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A dialogue against the abuse of daunsing.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
